thread.title: Digital Realty To Host Investor Day On October 6, 2015 In Ashburn, Virginia
thread.title_full: Digital Realty To Host Investor Day On October 6, 2015 In Ashburn, Virginia

author: admin
title: Digital Realty To Host Investor Day On October 6, 2015 In Ashburn, Virginia
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Digital Realty Trust, Inc. 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Digital Realty Trust, Inc. (NYSE: DLR), a leading global provider of data center solutions, announced today that it will host an Investor Day for institutional investors and sell-side analysts in Ashburn, Virginia beginning at 10:00 a.m. EDT on Tuesday, October 6, 2015. Chief Executive Officer A. William Stein, along with other members of the senior management team, will discuss the company's strategy, operating model, capital allocation and financial overview. 
A live audio webcast of the event and presentation materials will be available through the Investors section of Digital Realty's website at http://investor.digitalrealty.com . 
For Additional Information
